long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Citations can take time and style guides can be difficult to remember. Simplify your writing process and use Free Citation Generator developed by Plagiarism Checker X team. Select citation style and generate citations within the extension.
